mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_TB ( ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER_ID, GENRES, IMAGE_URL ) VALUES ( #{item.id}, #{item.title}, #{item.content}, #{item.writerId}, #{item.genres}, #{item.imageUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE(), '%y%m%d') AS CODE_DATE, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM BOOK_TB WHERE ID LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE(), '%y%m%d'), '%')
